experiences: Enhanced a personalized image annotation tool utilizing advanced deep learning techniques, resulting in a 50% increase in similar image retrieval accuracy.
Developed a user-friendly interface using Tkinter, allowing seamless image display, annotation, and search functionality
Developed and optimized backend functionalities using Python, Utilized a pretrained ResNet-50 model to extract image features, significantly improving retrieval accuracy by 50%.
Implemented data parallelism on Google Cloud Platform by utilizing 3 Virtual Machines (VMs) to distribute training data and accelerate Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) processing.
Achieved a 2x improvement in training speed by using cloud-based data parallelism, significantly reducing execution time.
Maintained model accuracy at 83% while improving training efficiency by using MPI4PY for effective synchronization andcommunication between the nodes in the distributed environment
